Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: EB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, and Blackstone due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, and Blackstone due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier sick customer at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Garfield.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
